metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Combines superhero action with dark comedy and social commentary, aligning with the user's enjoyment of shows like 'One-Punch Man', 'Rick and Morty' and 'Fallout', while also having elements of crime and drama.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on the classic detective, blending mystery and crime with strong dramatic elements. This should appeal to the user's appreciation for shows like 'The Night Manager', 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi mystery with complex plotlines and character development. Its darker tone and intricate narrative would resonate with fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation', with a touch of crime.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: A hilarious and critically acclaimed comedy with a unique style. Considering their enjoyment of comedies such as 'Scrubs', 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Brassic', this show's clever writing and quirky characters should appeal.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller with a strong mystery element, exploring themes of identity and corporate control. This show combines the sci-fi aspect of 'Foundation' and 'Love, Death & Robots' with the mysterious tone of 'All Her Fault' and 'The Night Manager'.
